cause.description:
Meningitis is a serious, often fatal illness in which a viral or bacterial infection inflames the meninges, causing symptoms such as severe headaches, vomiting, stiff neck, and high fever. It is common amoung college students, especially first year freshmen who haven't been vaccinated.
1. To end pointless deaths as a result of this illness.
2. Spread the knowledge needed to prevent Meningitis.
cause.mission: Educate and prevent the spread of this deadly disease.
cause.name: Meningitis Awareness and Prevention
